lore: After their rebellion, many Familiars went north and established a community in an old tower, inhabited only by Cornell and other Grimoires since the Apollinaire Massacre. There, they filled the looted shelves with books of science and magic.\n\nPalace Familiars are distinguished members of their community, who established the Council which decides on matters of trade, the provisioning of the tower, and Familiar activities. In battle, they throw their scepters at their enemies, then call their weapons back with telekinesis.
menagerieDialog: I'd rather work at the castle library than risk my life fighting beyond these steadfast walls.
There is a lot of wasted space in this castle. Perhaps you should set up a library where we can research new spells.
Did you know that an Eft can live for up to 20 days without water?
(Its eyes scan its surroundings with innocent curiosity.)
(Despite the fact that it can speak your language, this creature insists on hooting repeatedly to feign ignorance to whatever you tell it to do.)
name: Palace Familiar
